Lucrécia Paco (a mụrụ na 19 Ọktoba 1969) bụ onye Mozambik na-eme ihe nkiri
A na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama na Mozambique.
Dịka nwatakịrị, ọ na-enwe mmasị ịbụ abụ na ịgba egwú na egwu ọdịnala, nke a na-egbochi nke ukwuu n'oge tupu nnwere onwe Mozambique n'afọ 1975
A kụrụ Paco ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ maka iji asụsụ ọdịnala
Mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị, gọọmentị ndị Socialist gbara ndị otu nka ume, ọ sonyere site n'ịbụ abụ, ịgba egwu, na ịgụ abụ.
N'oge Agha Obodo Mozambik, Paco tụgharịrị uche ya n'ihe nkiri dịka ụdị ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
E gosipụtara ya na ihe ngosi 1984 Maputo Mulher N'afọ 1986, Paco bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere otu egwu Mutumbela Gogo, otu egwuregwu ihe nkiri mbụ na Mozambique nke ka na-aga n'ihu taa
Ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Soviet ọ na-ekiri nwere mmetụta n'ahụ ya, ma mepụta ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi banyere ihe ọ dịka ịbụ Mozambican
Iji kwado otu ihe nkiri ahụ, Paco na ndị otu ndị ọzọ guzobere ụlọ achịcha.
Paco were ezumike afọ ise site n'ọkwa n'ihi ike ọgwụgwụ. Instituto Itaú Cultural kpọrọ Paco ka ọ gaa Brazil n'afọ 2009
O sonyere na ọrụ Antidote na International Seminar on Cultural Actions in Conflict Zones, na-eji egwuregwu Mulher Asfalto. N'afọ 2010, a tụbara Paco na ihe nkiri Quero Ser uma Estrela
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi na Nineteens, telenovela mbụ nke Mozambique.
